name: Verify Digital Tachograph Card Number allows both letters and numbers
testScript: • Verified that the field allows a combination of alphanumeric

name: Verify Digital Tachograph Card Number allows maximum 25 characters
testScript: • Verified that the field does not allow you to enter more than 25 characters.

name: Verify Tacograph number and expiry added to reports (listed in test case)
Verify that i can see rate when creating a booking
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a client.
When :
  • On the bookings , manage booking page.
Then:
  • I can create a booking.
  • I can see rates and select an agency.

name: Verify that as a Neuven user on the user screen i can see the client name in the user column
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the User > User List page.
Then :
  • Select ' CLIENT' user type from the drop down list.
  • Table displays all the client user in the system.
  • There is a column called 'Client' that displays the name of the client the user belongs to.

name: Verify that as a Neuven user on the user screen i can see the Agency name in the user column
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the User > User List page.
Then :
  • Select ' Agency' user type from the drop down list.
  • Table displays all the Agency users in the system.
  • There is a column called 'Agency' that displays the name of the Agency the user belongs to.

name: Verify that as a Neuven when exporting the agency user lists the agency column is exported in the excel document.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the User > User List page.
  • Select ' Agency' user type from the drop down list.
  • Table displays all the Agency users in the system.
  • There is a column called 'Agency' that displays the name of the Agency the user belongs to.
Then :
  • Select the export icon. 
  • A excel document is exported to the downloads folder. 
  • Open the downloads folder. 
  • Open the excel document and check that the column names match the table on the user lists page.

name: Verify that as a Neuven when exporting the Client user lists the Client column is exported in the excel document.
testScript:
Given :
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When :
  • On the User > User List page.
  • Select 'Client' user type from the drop down list.
  • Table displays all the Client users in the system.
  • There is a column called 'Client' that displays the name of the Client the user belongs to.
Then :
  • Select the export icon. 
  • A excel document is exported to the downloads folder. 
  • Open the downloads folder. 
  • Open the excel document and check that the column names match the table on the user lists page.

name: Verify the search function on the agency name column.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page.
Then:
  • Select Agency from the user type drop down.
  • List of agency users is displayed.
  • Search for a agency name in the search field above the agency column.
  • The table should filter to shown only data related to that relevant agency.

name: Verify the search function on the Client name column.
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page.
Then:
  • Select Client  from the user type drop down.
  • List of Client users is displayed.
  • Search for Client  name in the search field above the Client  column.
  • The table should filter to shown only data related to that relevant Client.

name: Verify that when on the Agency user page as a Neuven user the Locked/unlocked drop down filters correctly. - LOCKED
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page.
Then:
  • Select Agency from the user type drop down.
  • List of agency users is displayed.
  • Select the lock option from the dropdown function.
  • The page refreshes and only the the locked users are displayed.

name: Verify that when on the Agency user page as a Neuven user the Locked/unlocked drop down filters correctly. - UNLOCKED
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page.
Then:
  • Select Agency from the user type drop down.
  • List of agency users is displayed.
  • Select the  unlock option from the dropdown function.
  • The page refreshes and only the the unlocked users are displayed.

  • The page refreshes and only the the locked users are displayed.

name: Verify that when on the Client user page as a Neuven user the Authorized/ unauthorized drop down filters correctly. - UNAUTHORIZED
testScript:
Given:
  • Logged on as a Neuven User.
When:
  • On the user lists page.
Then:
  • Select Client from the user type drop down.
  • List of Client users is displayed.
  • Select the  unauthorized  option from the dropdown function.
  • The page refreshes and only the the  unauthorized users are displayed.

name: Verify that when on the Agency user page as a Neuven user the authorized / unauthorized dropdown filters correctly. - UNAUTHORIZED.
testScript:

  • The page refreshes and only the the  unauthorized users are displayed.

name: Add Employee Documents - Creating new worker
testScript:
Click on Manage worker details
Add New worker
Click Create Worker and add documents or Save Worker and edit documents
Add Employee Documents

name: Add Employee Documents - Editing worker
testScript:
Click on Manage worker details
Edit Worker
Click Create Worker and add documents or Save Worker and edit documents
Add Employee Documents

name: Add Employee Documents Page
testScript:
Page to contain
  •   Please upload scanned copies of below documents:
  • Select document type dropdown
    • Dropdown to load with all the default documents set in the documents administration page
    • Dropdown to also include client-specific documents set in the documents administration page - for the clients the agency is linked to.
  • Expiry Date
    • Date picker to choose a date
    • Not a mandatory field
    • Allow Null entries (Expiry date is irrelevant for some document types)
  •  Drop or click to upload documents here
    • Dropbox for documents
    • Specify the allowed formats and size of the document at the bottom of the Dropbox as shown on the mockup
    • Allow drag and drop or click through to choose documents to upload
  • Upload button
    • Click
    • The document is uploaded and shown in the table below

name: Error Messages
testScript:
• Upload clicked without choosing document type ‘please select document type’ displayed.
  • Upload clicked with a document that does not match with the specified formats ‘document filetype not supported’ is displayed
  • Upload clicked with a document that exceeds the specified size ‘File too large for upload’ displayed
  • Upload clicked without a document in the drop box ‘Please choose a file to upload’ is displayed
  • Upload clicked with a document type that already exists on the table ‘Document already exist – Do you want to replace the existing document’ displayed in a pop-up window
    • Yes Button
      • Clicked - Document replaced – window closed
    • No Button
      • Clicked – window closed

name: Existing Employee Documents table - Settings
testScript:
• Table to have a search box at the top
  • Table to have pagination at the bottom
  • Page numbers to be clickable, and arrows to move forward and backward by the user
  • Table to have select page size drop-down at the bottom with 10,20,50 and 100 options
  • When page size is selected table should show the appropriate number of rows based on the selection
  • The bottom of the table shows the total number of items on current pages vs the overall total number of items (EG Showing 10 of 100 entries), in the right corner

name: Existing Employee Documents table
testScript:
Table columns
  • Document type
    • Document type selected when uploading is displayed
  • Document Name
    • Document File Name is displayed
  • Expiry Date
    • Expiry date selected when uploading is displayed
  • Uploaded On
    • Display date document was uploaded
  • Action
    • Delete icon displayed
      • Clicked – ‘Are you sure you want to delete the document’ displayed in a pop-up window
      • Yes Button
        • Clicked – Document Deleted– window closed
      • No Button
        • Clicked – window closed

name: Logged in as a Client User
testScript:
• View Worker Documents
  • Select Agency
  • Documents – View
  • Window displaying List of default documents plus the client-specific documents with upload details displayed.
  • There are no changes to this window – except the list of documents shown will now change dynamically based on client viewing the documents - linked to client-specific documents defined in the documents maintenance page
  • Also add a new column Mandatory and show whether the document type was specified as mandatory in the documents maintenance page
